chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
y: lb
x: lb
a: lb

Goal:
a ⟂ x -> a ⟂ y -> x ⟂ y <-> (a ⊕ x) ↓ (a ⊕ y) ≂ a

Premises:
lb_ortho_plus_join : forall x y : lb, x ⟂ y -> x ⊕ y ≂ x ↑ y
lb_ortho_join : forall a x y : lb, a ⟂ x ↑ y < -> a ⟂ x /\ a ⟂ y
lb_ortho_anti : forall a b x y : lb, a ⪯ b -> x ⪯ y -> b ⟂ y -> a ⟂ x
lb_ortho_iff : forall x y : lb, x ≂ y -> forall x0 y0 : lb, x0 ≂ y0 -> x ⟂ x0 < -> y ⟂ y0
lb_ortho_anti_left : forall a b x : lb, a ⪯ b -> b ⟂ x -> a ⟂ x
lb_ortho_mask_nil : forall a x : lb, a ⟂ x -> x ⪯ a -> x ≂ nil
lb_ortho_meet_nil : forall x y : lb, x ⟂ y < -> x ↓ y ≂ nil
lb_plus_eq : forall (a : bool) (x y : lb), x ≂ y -> forall x0 y0 : lb, x0 ≂ y0 -> lb_plus a x x0 ≂ lb_plus a y y0
lb_ortho_sym : forall a b : lb, a ⟂ b -> b ⟂ a
lb_ortho_plus : forall l m : lb, l ⟂ m < -> l ⪯ l ⊕ m
lb_join_meet_distr : forall a b c : lb, a ↑ b ↓ c ≂ (a ↑ b) ↓ (a ↑ c)
in_lb_ortho_2 : forall (x y : bool) (l m : lb), x = ⟘ \/ y = ⟘ -> l ⟂ m -> x :: l ⟂ y :: m
lb_meet_join_idem : forall a b : lb, a ↓ (a ↑ b) ≂ a
lb_minus : forall a b : lb, a ⪯ b -> {c : lb | a ⟂ c /\ b ≂ a ↑ c}
lb_ortho_iff_Proper = fun (x y : lb) (H : x ≂ y) (x0 y0 : lb) (H0 : x0 ≂ y0) => (fun (x1 y1 : lb) (H1 : x1 ≂ y1) => match H1 with | conj H2 H3 => fun (x2 y2 : lb) (H4 : x2 ≂ y2) => match H4 with | conj H5 H6 => conj (lb_ortho_anti H3 H6) (lb_ortho_anti H2 H5) end end) x y H x0 y0 H0 : Morphisms.Proper (lb_mask_equiv ==> lb_mask_equiv ==> iff) lb_ortho Expanded type for implicit arguments lb_ortho_iff_Proper : forall [x y : lb], x ≂ y -> forall x0 y0 : lb, x0 ≂ y0 -> (x ⟂ x0 -> y ⟂ y0) /\ (y ⟂ y0 -> x ⟂ x...
lb_meet_length : forall a b : lb, length a = length b -> length (a ↓ b) = length a
lb_ortho_cons_inv : forall (x y : bool) (l m : lb), x :: l ⟂ y :: m -> (x = ⟘ \/ y = ⟘) /\ l ⟂ m
Inductive lb_ortho : lb -> lb -> Prop := in_lb_ortho_0 : forall l : lb, nil ⟂ l | in_lb_ortho_1 : forall l : lb, l ⟂ nil | in_lb_ortho_2 : forall (x y : bool) (l m : lb), x = ⟘ \/ y = ⟘ -> l ⟂ m -> x :: l ⟂ y :: m Arguments lb_ortho (_ _)%list_scope Arguments in_lb_ortho_0 _%list_scope Arguments in_lb_ortho_1 _%list_scope Arguments in_lb_ortho_2 [x y]%bool_scope [l m]%list_scope
lb_plus_fix_2 : forall (a x y : bool) (l m : lb), lb_plus a (x :: l) (y :: m) = (let (r, z) := bin_add a x y in z :: lb_plus r l m)
lb_complement : forall a b : lb, {c : lb | b ⟂ c /\ a ↑ b ≂ c ↑ b}
lb_meet_eq : forall x y : lb, x ≂ y -> forall x0 y0 : lb, x0 ≂ y0 -> x ↓ x0 ≂ y ↓ y0
lb_plus = fix lb_plus (a : bool) (l m : lb) {struct l} : lb := match l with | nil => lb_succ a m | x :: l0 => match m with | nil => lb_succ a l | y :: m0 => let (r, z) := bin_add a x y in z :: lb_plus r l0 m0 end end : bool -> lb -> lb -> lb Arguments lb_plus _%bool_scope (_ _)%list_scope
measure_rect : forall (X : Type) (m : X -> nat) (P : X -> Type), (forall x : X, (forall y : X, m y < m x -> P y) -> P x) -> forall x : X, P x
lb_mask_meet : forall a b : lb, a ⪯ b < -> a ↓ b ≂ a
lb_mask_le_iff : forall x y : lb, x ≂ y -> forall x0 y0 : lb, x0 ≂ y0 -> x ⪯ x0 < -> y ⪯ y0
lb_ortho_sind : forall P : lb -> lb -> SProp, (forall l : lb, P nil l) -> (forall l : lb, P l nil) -> (forall (x y : bool) (l m : lb), x = ⟘ \/ y = ⟘ -> l ⟂ m -> P l m -> P (x :: l) (y :: m)) -> forall l l0 : lb, l ⟂ l0 -> P l l0
lb_ortho_ind : forall P : lb -> lb -> Prop, (forall l : lb, P nil l) -> (forall l : lb, P l nil) -> (forall (x y : bool) (l m : lb), x = ⟘ \/ y = ⟘ -> l ⟂ m -> P l m -> P (x :: l) (y :: m)) -> forall l l0 : lb, l ⟂ l0 -> P l l0
lb_succ = fix lb_succ (a : bool) (l : lb) {struct l} : lb := match l with | nil => a :: nil | x :: l0 => let (r, z) := bin_add ⟘ a x in z :: lb_succ r l0 end : bool -> lb -> lb Arguments lb_succ _%bool_scope _%list_scope
lb_meet_mono : forall l m a b : lb, l ⪯ m -> a ⪯ b -> l ↓ a ⪯ m ↓ b
lb_meet_eq_Proper = fun (x y : lb) (H : x ≂ y) (x0 y0 : lb) (H0 : x0 ≂ y0) => (fun (x1 y1 : lb) (H1 : x1 ≂ y1) => match H1 with | conj H2 H3 => fun (x2 y2 : lb) (H4 : x2 ≂ y2) => match H4 with | conj H5 H6 => conj (lb_meet_mono H2 H5) (lb_meet_mono H3 H6) end end) x y H x0 y0 H0 : Morphisms.Proper (lb_mask_equiv ==> lb_mask_equiv ==> lb_mask_equiv) lb_meet Expanded type for implicit arguments lb_meet_eq_Proper : forall [x y : lb], x ≂ y ->...-> x ↓ x0 ⪯ y ↓ y0 /\ y ↓ y0 ⪯ x ↓ x0 Arguments lb_meet_eq_Proper [x y] _ [x0 y0]
